repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This text is about adoption of the heir. Documentation note before the front folio: Dattamīmāṃsā Dharma by Nandapaṇḍita Grantha 62 pages 8 lines complete.

msItem.title: Dattamīmāṃsā
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 vasiṣṭaḥ aputromṛtaputraṃ strīprajonirji?tātmajaṃ . (2 illegible syllables.) saśāṇāmaputratve putrasvīkaraṇaṃ (illegible 2 syllables as the folio is damaged followed by gap of 4 syllables as the folio is broken.) pravṛttau śaunakaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ
msItem.explicit: 31v 1 yaṃ . śa kāmukavidhavāyāḥ dattaputrasvīkaraṇaṃ kāryameveti bhāvaḥ . tadā pitrādyamulakaviṣayaṃ na ?svatantreṇa strīyāṃ yāvajjivam . ṅa svataṃtrameva ..
msItem.finalRubric:
31v 1 iti dattaputramimāṃsā nandipaṇḍitā
31v 2 cāryapraṇitā samāptā . . śūbamastu ..

support.p: Thin palm leaf as guard folio.

supportDesc.foliation: amil letter numerals in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: Condition good. Some folio with broken margins.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written on 1v in the left margin on 1v.
Title of the text is written in the left margin [da]ttaputramimāṃsā with name [śrī]vidyāraṇya.

listBibl.bibl: Dattakamīmāṃsā: Mārūlakaropāhvaśāstripraṇīta Mañjarivyākhyāsaṃvalitā Dattakamīmāṃsā seyaṃ ve śā saṃ rā śaṃkaraśāstriMārūlakara ityetaiḥ saṃśodhitā Ānandāśramamudraṇālaye mudrayitā prakāśitam, Ānandāśrama śanskrita granthāvaliḥ granthāṅka 116 dvitīyāvṛttiḥ 1954 (Available on archive org.)

encodingDesc.p: Inferred text is put in the square bracket. Question mark is used to show unclear syllable.
